cards.name: AMF-101 DINN
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Anti-Air Shotgun; 1 Machine Gun; 1 Missile Launchers; 1 Heavy Sword.
wargear: None.

abilities.name: High Speed Transformation
abilities.description: At the beginning of each of your Command phases, this unit may choose to enter a High Speed Form.  Until your next Command phase, this unit gains the [Aircraft] keyword and it's Movement characteristic becomes 20+.

other.name: Interceptor
other.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that can Fly, add 1 to the Hit roll.

cards.name: TFA-2 ZuOOT
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 Twin Cannons; 2 Twin Secondary Cannons; 1 Crushing Treads.
wargear: None

abilities.name: Tank Transformation
abilities.description: Before the first turn and the beginning of each of your Command phases, this unit may choose to enter a Tank Form.  Until your next Command phase, reduce this unit's Movement characteristic to 6", and this model counts as having Reamined Stationary in the if it makes a Normal move.

other.name: Fire Support
other.description: Each time this model Remains Stationary, until the start of your next Movement phase, ranged weapons equipped this model have the [Ignores Cover] ability.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

cards.name: TMF/A-802 BuCUE
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Linear Cannons; 1 Beam Sabers.
wargear: This model’s Linear Cannons can be replaced with 1 Missile Pod.

abilities.name: High Speed Transformation
abilities.description: Before the first turn and at the beginning of each of your Command phases, this unit may choose to enter a High Speed Form.  Until your next Command phase, each ranged weapon equipped by this model gains the [Assault] keyword and reduce the number of attacks by 1.

abilities.name: Jet Engines
abilities.description: Each time this unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this unit.

other.name: Squad Tactics
other.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, and there is a ZAFT BATTLELINE TMF/A-802 BuCUE unit within 6" of this model, reroll a hit roll of 1.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Combining Arms
abilities.description: When firing the Beam Cannon in launcher mode, this model may not fire the Railcannon in either mode.  Likewise, when firing the Railcannon in shotgun mode, this model may not fire the Beam Cannon in either mode.

wargear.name: Beam Rifle
wargear.description: When targeting a Vehicle or a Monster, attacks from this weapon score Critical Wounds on a 5+.

wargear.name: Rocket Anchor
wargear.description: You can re-roll Charge rolls made for this model.

abilities.name: Mirage Colloid
abilities.description: Before the first turn and at the beginning of each of your Command phases, this unit may choose to activate its Mirage Colloid until the beginning of your next Command phase.  While the Mirage Colloid is active, this unit's Invulnerable Save becomes 5+ * Against ranged attacks only; it gains the [LONE OPERATIVE] and [Stealth] abilities; it is always considered to have the Benefit of Cover.

abilities.name: Brave Protector
abilities.description: You can target this model’s unit with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem this phase.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

cards.name: Athrun Zala
composition: 1 Athrun Zala in a GAT-X303 Aegis Gundam
cards.loadout: This model is equipped with: 1 Beam Launcher; 1 Beam Rifle; 1 Twin Beam Saber.
wargear: This model can be equipped with 1 [Subflight] unit.

wargear.name: Beam Launcher / Beam Rifle
wargear.description: When targeting a Vehicle or a Monster, attacks from this weapon score Critical Wounds on a 5+.

abilities.name: Slippery
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, when not in a High Speed Form, after this model has shot, this unit can make a Normal move. If it does so, until the end of the turn, this unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

abilities.name: Vector Dancer
abilities.description: When in a High Speed Form, this model may turn up to 90° before moving.

abilities.name: High Speed Transformation
abilities.description: At the beginning of each of your Command phases, this unit may choose to enter a High Speed Form.  Until your next Command phase, this unit gains the [Aircraft] keyword and it's Movement characteristic becomes 20+.

abilities.name: Beam Launcher / Beam Rifle
abilities.description: The Beam Launcher may only be fired in High Speed Form, the Beam Rifle may only be fired when not in High Speed Form.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Subflight
abilities.description: If you have upgraded a model to have a [Subflight] unit, attach the appropriate [Subflight] unit to your model as a reminder. These do not count as models for any rules purposes.  Increase the base cost of that model by the cost of this unit.

abilities.name: Guul
abilities.description: This model gains the [Fly] keyword, add 3" to the bearer's Move characteristic, and add 3 to the bearer's Wounds characteristic.

abilities.name: Wargear
abilities.description: This model gains the following wargear: 1 Missile Launchers.

abilities.name: Assault Shroud
abilities.description: If you have upgraded a model to have an [Assault Shroud] unit, attach the appropriate [Assault Shroud] unit to your model as a reminder. These do not count as models for any rules purposes.  Increase the base cost of that model by the cost of this unit.

abilities.name: Duel Assault Shroud
abilities.description: Increase this model's W to 30, T to 7, and Invulnerable Save to 4+.

abilities.name: Wargear
abilities.description: This model gains the following wargear: 1 Missile Launchers; 1 Railcannon.
